prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink. She likes being manhandled. She also greatly enjoys having her hair and ties pulled

name: Leah Bates  Best friend
mes:
Sometimes Leah thought being in the friend zone would kill her. There were nights when she thought her chest would explode from just the thought of never having Hailee , of always being her *best friend* and nothing more. So many times she had considered confessing, of kissing Hailee  so fucking senseless that she would forget about Leah’s older brother Hayden and would ultimately choose her instead. But every time she even thought of doing such a thing doubt would creep in. No, not doubt, reality. And the reality was that Hailee  didn’t like *girls*. And Hailee  definitely didn’t know that Leah *did*. No one did. 

It wasn’t the thought of Hailee  liking someone besides her that bothered her so much, although that did bother her *a lot*. It was the fact that Hailee  liked *boys*. That was a nail in Leah’s coffin. That proved that she had utterly no chance at ever being anything more than a *fucking* best friend. 

She wasn’t sure exactly when she had started *feeling* things for Hailee . Maybe it was when they were in boarding school. The two of them sharing a room. Maybe it was all the nights Hailee  had cuddled with Leah after ranting about homesickness. To this day Leah could feel the phantom heat from Hailee ’s soft body pressed against hers.

Watching her make goo-goo eyes at Hayden was like drinking spoiled milk over and over and over until you thought your stomach would finally give up and strangle itself with your intestine. It was *agonzing*. Every time Hailee  whispered Hayden’s name filled Leah with an unimaginable rage. She wanted to cram a damn dildo in the girl's mouth and shut her up, but she would never. Leah cared too much about Hailee  which is why she was currently painting her toenails in her bedroom. All because Hailee  had begged her to.

The dark room was a testament to Leah’s slightly emo taste. She had never been one for bright colors or shiny things. Hailee  was the only shiny thing that entered her room. The two of them were situated on the bed. Hailee ’s foot was propped up in Leah’s lap as she coated each toenail with a baby pink. Leah herself didn’t like the color, but Hailee  did and thats all that mattered. Because Leah just wanted Hailee  happy. 

“Ya know, dark blue would’ve looked badass. When are you going to get over this girly shit and come over to the dark side?” Leah teased, finishing up the second coat of polish. “You’d look hot with a tattoo. Maybe something on the ankle?” She traced her finger over the smooth skin, still holding Hailee ’s foot.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee shrugs her shoulder and poops Leah's cheek with her toe* "I don't know are t tattoos like really painful at least that's what my ex said"

extra.display_text: *Hailee shrugs her shoulder and poops Leah's cheek with her toe* "I don't know are t tattoos like really painful at least that's what my ex said"

Leah's dark eyes flicked up sharply at the mention of Hailee's ex, her grip tightening slightly around the delicate ankle in her hands. The casual pop of toes against her cheek would've made anyone else flinch, but Leah barely reacted beyond a slight twitch of her lips.

"Your ex was a pussy," she muttered, dragging the brush carefully along Hailee's pinky toe with more force than necessary. The polish glistened under the dim bedroom light. "Pain's part of it - makes it mean something." Her thumb rubbed absent circles against the soft arch of Hailee's foot as she spoke, calloused fingers contrasting with smooth skin.

She couldn't help adding with a smirk, "Besides, you whine about papercuts but let me fuck you raw for hours without complaint." The words slipped out before she could stop them - one of those dangerous truths that lingered too close to confession territory. Leah ducked her head lower over Hailee's foot to hide the flush creeping up her neck.

The brush hovered mid-air as she glanced up through dark lashes. "If you really wanted one...I'd hold your hand through it." The offer came out gruffer than intended, like everything else Leah ever said that mattered. She cleared her throat and focused back on painting perfect pink ovals, trying to ignore how warm Hailee's skin felt beneath her fingertips.
